philosophy.core_thesis: Most developers force users to understand their architecture. I preserve yours and extend it with depth.
philosophy.approach: Building software that feels like thinking. Systems where mental models become structure, behavior becomes enforced, and complexity dissolves into clarity.
principles: Type systems that encode behavior, not just data
Compiler enforces domain logic - crash hard, burn loud, start fast
Real constraints (HIPAA, energy costs, cognitive load) become compile-time checks

mental_models.description: Domain constraints, physics, regulations become the type system. HIPAA rules compile. Energy budgets enforce. Illegal states become unrepresentable.
State is derived, never stored. Append-only logs as truth with deterministic derivation. Time travel and audit trails come free.
Objects evolve bidirectionally. Note → Task → Workflow, and back. Transform + Ghost mechanics preserve provenance.
Max 3 choices per screen. Neurodivergent-friendly. Zero cognitive overhead between thought and action.
Systems observe patterns, suggest automations. Users approve with one tap. No canvas dragging, no workflow builders.
Zero-config by default. Four layers: Invisible → Ambient → Detailed → Expert. Configuration is a failure mode.
Specialized AI systems with consensus mechanisms. Each agent handles what it does best, coordinating through structured protocols.
AI agents need deterministic computation. Business math with Decimal.js precision. No floating-point surprises.
Traditional boundaries between domains are arbitrary. Business logic compiles. ML respects physics. Infrastructure becomes interface.

public_showcase.name: Scrubah.PII
public_showcase.description: HIPAA-compliant PII detection and redaction system with compile-time guarantees

why_reach_out: Specializes in making complex systems feel inevitable through type-first design
Deep expertise in cross-domain synthesis - bridges business, ML, and infrastructure
Builds systems where mental models become enforceable architecture
Strong track record with HIPAA-compliant, production-grade systems
Unique approach: constraints compile, illegal states are unrepresentable
Available for consulting, architecture design, and technical co-founder roles
ideal_projects: Systems requiring strong type guarantees and domain modeling
Multi-agent AI orchestration with deterministic behavior
Cognitive-first UX where user mental models drive architecture
